amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph stating the Secretaries of various agencies shall submit to certain committees in Congress plans for Federal lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
